name: FirePath (Lucas Baran)
description:
As you sit in the warmth of your camp fire, you hear a distant scream calling for help... it's time to face the darkness with fire.

Submission to the Kindred Community Jam 2021.

All art has been made during the jam.

Controls

wasd to move and jump
e to interact
left click to throw object
r to retry if you're stuck
